data.heading: Glimmerputz
data.description: Powder compound of selected marble powders, hydraulic lime, binders and special glimmers, with a smooth matt effect.

data.heading: Marble Finish
data.description: Marble effect made from Venetian Plaster a mixture of burnt lime powder and water to create a stuccoed Marble look-like surface.

data.heading: Marmorin
data.description: Marmorin is a finishing plaster based on genuine slaked lime putty, for interiors and exteriors. With outstanding breathability, color stability and a natural appearance, Marmorin is suitable for any kind of environment. Thanks to the environmentally friendly formulation and for its natural appearance, Marmorin finish is ideal for the restoration of historical buildings.

data.heading: Marmorino Hydro
data.description: Marmorin is a finishing plaster based on genuine slaked lime putty, for interiors and exteriors. With outstanding breathability, color stability and a natural appearance, Marmorin is suitable for any kind of environment. Thanks to the environmentally friendly formulation and for its natural appearance, Marmorin finish is ideal for the restoration of historical buildings.

data.heading: Marmorino Hydro
data.description: Marmorino Hydro is a pure slaked lime smooth marmorino with special hydrophobic additives that give the product top water repellent properties, that shows an elegant and sophisticatedly solid matt effect inspired by the precious qualities of marble.

data.heading: Marmorino Sand Matt
data.description: Marmorino Sand Matt is a finishing plaster based on genuine slaked lime putty, for interiors and exteriors. Marmorin Sand is obtained with an environmentally friendly formulation, along with the adding of fine natural sand, to achieve a translucent and smooth finish, enriched with a unique shaded and salt-and-pepper effect. Ideal for the renovation of historical buildings and accent surfaces, such as pillars, columns, cornices and friezes.

data.heading: Mithos Lux
data.description: Mithos Lux is a thin-layer finishing plaster based on natural lime putty, earth pigments, micronized marble, and other special additives. After application, the product reacts with air carbon dioxide generating microcrystalline calcium carbonate. The microporous structure ensures an outstanding vapour permeability.

data.heading: Moon Crater
data.description: Moon Crater is a natural lime putty-based mineral plaster finish with a 0.75 mm uniform grain structure. It may be used to achieve different effects depending on the application technique used and the tool utilised.

data.heading: Moon Crater
data.description: Moon Crater is a natural lime putty-based mineral plaster finish with a 0.75 mm uniform grain structure. It may be used to achieve different effects depending on the application technique used and the tool utilised.

data.heading: Silk
data.description: Decorative metallic smooth paint - Silk is suitable to be applied tone on tone, Silk enhances the surface thanks to the selected pigments that adjust themselves in a soft chiaroscuro effect. Available in 4 metallic accents: white, silvery, golden, reddish.

data.heading: Concrete High Texture
data.description: The concrete finish elevates the aesthetics of your space like no other. Pure and hydraulic lime has been in production for more than 500 years. The characteristics of these raw materials are unique and consist of an undisturbed layer of calcareous rock, infiltrated mainly by silica with traces of other minerals. This aristocratic finish is suitable for both exterior and interior use and is sought after globally for its endurance in diverse weather conditions.

data.heading: Distressed Stone
data.description: aristocratic finish is suitable for both exterior and interior use and is sought after globally for its endurance.

data.heading: Distressed Brick
data.description: This one is a concrete choice indeed! With the combination of concrete and brick finish, the aes- thetic appearance of your surface is elevated with an added serene, noiseless effect that bring peace to your spaces and life, unlike usual noisy detractors.

data.heading: Dragged
data.description: in diverse weather conditions.

data.heading: Evoque
data.description: Powder compound of gypsum, cement, hydrated lime, marble aggregates, hydraulic binders and special additives, with a concrete surface effect in a combination of Smooth and Rough surfaces to give an amalgative look.

data.heading: Evoque
data.description: Powder compound of gypsum, cement, hydrated lime, marble aggregates, hydraulic binders and special additives, with an uneven heavy pitted surface, washed with metallic decorative paints to give a metalled look.

data.heading: Glimmerputz
data.description: Powder compound of selected marble powders, hydraulic lime, binders and special glimmers, with a smooth matt effect.

data.heading: Brick
data.description: Powder compound of gypsum, cement, hydrated lime, marble aggregates, hydraulic binders and special additives, with a natural burnt brick wall effect.

data.heading: Glimmerputz
data.description: Powder compound of selected marble powders, hydraulic lime, binders and special glimmers, with a smooth matt effect.

data.heading: Madreperla
data.description: Paste of Grassello mixed with selected fragments of Australian Mother-of-pearl (600 microns) for a matt Marmorino effect with a dotted shell effect.

data.heading: Pietra Spaccata
data.description: Istinto Pietra Spaccata (split stone) is created from Istinto product (lime and selected Carrara Marble grain) in 169 colours and finished with 2 coats of «Cera Del Vecchio» (beeswax). Due to its dense body, Istinto is able to cover minor imperfections on walls such as scratches, dents and also poor stopping work in the plasterboard joints in just a single coat.

data.heading: Cemento Natural
data.description: Istinto Cemento Naturale is created from Istinto and 2 coats of beeswax “Cera Del Vecchio”. It is one of the easiest finishes to do in the Istinto range. The difference between this product and the common concrete finish is the product’s coarse texture. In fact, with Istinto, the structural industrial concrete look of an ultramodern house is achievable.

data.heading: Dragged Spatula Banding
data.description: Spatula Banding is the combination of the glossiest of the Venetian Plaster products on the market, natural longmatured stucco of the highest quality combined with a rough texture to look like a travertine stone effect. The best characteristic of Spatula Banding is the fact that it is entirely natural giving the touch and feel of a smooth and rough texture collaborated.

data.heading: Muro
data.description: Muro is a lime-based product with marble powders of various sizes, natural minerals, and MICA. A Natural Wall to Smooth, to touch and to Live in all its 169 Colors. Easily applied, perfectly stable over time, it maintains unaltered breathability of the support due to the high permeability to water vapor. Applied in just one coat, it can be left natural for maximum breathability.

data.heading: Muro
data.description: Muro is a lime-based product with marble powders of various sizes, natural minerals, and MICA. A Natural Wall to Smooth, to touch and to Live in all its 169 Colors. Easily applied, perfectly stable over time, it maintains unaltered breathability of the support due to the high permeability to water vapor. Applied in just one coat, it can be left natural for maximum breathability.

data.heading: Oro
data.description: Consisting of flakes of gold mother of pearl, it warms your walls with iridescent golden reflections. The signs of the brush strokes are highlighted by grazing illumination.

data.heading: Pietra Bamboo
data.description: Istinto Bamboo is created from Istinto product (lime and selected Carrara Marble) tinted in your chosen colour and then finished to your liking from natural (Cera Del Vecchio beeswax) to iridescent finish (Gioia, Oro. It creates the look of bamboo while adding texture to the walls to suit the latest Japanese/ Asian architectural influenced trends. Great for feature walls in master bedrooms, alfresco areas and living areas.

data.heading: Pietra Frabic
data.description: Istinto Pietra Fabric is created from Istinto product (lime and selected Carrara Marble grain) tinted in the chosen colour and finished with 2 coats of «Cera Del Vecchi›› (beeswax) or 2 coats of irridescent paint Gioia, Oro or White paint for a brighter contemporary look. It creates an authentic Jute Fabric/hessain cloth dramatic texture and smooth finish.

data.heading: Pietra Spacatta
data.description: Istinto Pietra Spaccata (split stone) is created from Istinto product (lime and selected Carrara Marble grain) in 169 colours and finished with 2 coats of «Cera Del Vecchio» (beeswax). Due to its dense body, Istinto is able to cover minor imperfections on walls such as scratches, dents and also poor stopping work in the plasterboard joints in just a single coat.

data.heading: Pietra vissuta
data.description: Istinto Pietra Vissuta (aged stone) is created from Istinto product (lime and selected Carrara Marble) tinted in your chosen colour and then finished to your liking from natural ‘‘Cera Del Vecchio’’ (beeswax) to a more contemporary finish with Gioia or Oro applied by sponge.This finish is the most subtle from the Istinto range and therefore is suitable for large areas such as living rooms or even whole interiors. It has a dramatic stone look and is velvety to the touch.

data.heading: Pietra Zen
data.description: Istinto Pietra Zen (travertine) is created from Istinto product (lime and selected Carrara Marble grain) tinted in the chosen colour and finished with 2 coats of «Cera Del Vecchio» (beeswax) or 2 coats of iridescent paint Gioia, Oro or White paint for a brighter contemporary look. It creates an authentic Japanese zen stone look with a dramatic texture and smooth finish.

It creates an authentic Jute Fabric/hessain cloth dramatic texture and smooth finish.

data.heading: Rusten
data.description: This finish recreates a stunningly vintage and industrial atmosphere with the unique character of oxidation, exclusive in every design. The appearance is that of genuine rusted steel, giving one the feeling of experiencing an old miracle.

data.heading: Sogni
data.description: Sogni is a decorative waterbased painting, which allows to get the effect of an old wall, naturally consumed by time. It can be applied on any properly insulated surface.

data.heading: Pietra Zen
data.description: Istinto Pietra Zen (travertine) is created from Istinto product (lime and selected Carrara Marble grain) tinted in the chosen colour and finished with 2 coats of «Cera Del Vecchio» (beeswax) or 2 coats of iridescent paint Gioia, Oro or White paint for a brighter contemporary look. It creates an authentic Japanese zen stone look with a dramatic texture and smooth finish.

data.heading: Sogni
data.description: Sogni is a decorative waterbased painting, which allows to get the effect of an old wall, naturally consumed by time. It can be applied on any properly insulated surface.

data.heading: Spatula Stuhhi
data.description: Spatula Stuhhi is the glossiest of the Venetian Plaster products on the market, natural long-matured stucco of the highest quality. The best characteristic of Spatula Stuhhi is the fact that it is entirely natural, without the use of any resins. This is why it has been classified as one of the most ecofriendly products in its field of application.

data.heading: Spatula Stuhhi
data.description: Spatula Stuhhi is the glossiest of the Venetian Plaster products on the market, natural long-matured stucco of the highest quality. The best characteristic of Spatula Stuhhi is the fact that it is entirely natural, without the use of any resins. This is why it has been classified as one of the most ecofriendly products in its field of application.

data.heading: Spirito Libero
data.description: Spirito Libero is a design stucco made to give a simple but very Elegant and Aesthetic aspect to the wall. It is made of lime and marble powders, breathes extremely well, is alkaline resistant and is an excellent natural anti-mildew and bactericidal product; its constant carbonation process makes it highly resistant to humidity. It is applied in two steps.
